column4: I'm running 8.04 on a laptop that previously ran 7.10 flawlessly. However, under 8.04, my memory usage sitting at the desktop, doing nothing, straight out of the box, is over 300mb
On a laptop with only 512mb of RAM and a small swap partition, this is a huge problem.
(especially because Firefox 3 is a hog and eats entire villages for breakfast, before starting on my RAM)
- yeah. I have reverted to ff2. Wasn't keen on the beta.
